languages.text: "Официальная версия — он не успел прибыть на место событий из-за атак в других местах. У меня есть другие соображения, но я, пожалуй, придержу их при себе".
"The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."
languages.original_text: "Официальная версия — он не успел прибыть на место событий из-за атак в других местах. У меня есть другие соображения, но я, пожалуй, придержу их при себе".

traits.locale_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

traits.locale_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

traits.locale_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “官方理由是，由于其他区域发生了袭击，他未能及时赶到宫殿。我对此有其他见解，不过我看还是别说出来为妙。”
languages.original_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

traits.locale_text: “官方理由是，由于其他区域发生了袭击，他未能及时赶到宫殿。我对此有其他见解，不过我看还是别说出来为妙。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Officiellement, des escarmouches ont eu lieu un peu partout et l'ont empêché de rejoindre le palais à temps. J'ai ma propre théorie, mais il vaut sans doute mieux que je la garde pour moi. »
languages.original_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

traits.locale_text: « Officiellement, des escarmouches ont eu lieu un peu partout et l'ont empêché de rejoindre le palais à temps. J'ai ma propre théorie, mais il vaut sans doute mieux que je la garde pour moi. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «La razón oficial es que no llegó a tiempo al palacio por culpa de los ataques en otros lugares. Tengo mis propias teorías, pero creo que será mejor que me las guarde».
languages.original_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

traits.locale_text: «La razón oficial es que no llegó a tiempo al palacio por culpa de los ataques en otros lugares. Tengo mis propias teorías, pero creo que será mejor que me las guarde».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「公の理由としては、そこかしこで襲撃が発生していたために宮殿への到着が間に合わなかったとのことです。私なりの自説はありますが、胸に秘めておきましょう」
languages.original_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

traits.locale_text: 「公の理由としては、そこかしこで襲撃が発生していたために宮殿への到着が間に合わなかったとのことです。私なりの自説はありますが、胸に秘めておきましょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Offiziell, weil er den Palast wegen anderer Angriffe anderswo nicht rechtzeitig erreichen konnte. Ich habe meine eigenen Theorien, doch die behalte ich wohl lieber für mich."
languages.original_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

traits.locale_text: "Offiziell, weil er den Palast wegen anderer Angriffe anderswo nicht rechtzeitig erreichen konnte. Ich habe meine eigenen Theorien, doch die behalte ich wohl lieber für mich."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

languages.text: "Resmî gerekçesi, diğer yerlerde yaşanan saldırılar sebebiyle saraya zamana ulaşamamasıymış. Benim aklımda başka şeyler var ama onları kendime saklamam daha hayırlı olabilir."
languages.original_text: "The official reason is that he failed to reach the palace in time because of attacks happening elsewhere. I have my own theories, but I suppose I had better keep them to myself."

traits.locale_text: "Resmî gerekçesi, diğer yerlerde yaşanan saldırılar sebebiyle saraya zamana ulaşamamasıymış. Benim aklımda başka şeyler var ama onları kendime saklamam daha hayırlı olabilir."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
